name: Retro Car Racing
description:
[A, Left Arrow] Move Left
[D, Right Arrow] Move Right
[Spacebar] Speed up, Start Game

A clone of a classic using Rust's Bevy engine.
Brick game retro car racing game clone was something I always wanted to play but I never had a brick game of my own. I only saw my friends playing it. Now that I am an adult I can have my own.
